name: PairAnything
description: For large retailers, like Target, that want to sell more to shoppers, especially who are underserved, PairAnything provides digital in-store food & wine pairings and actionable insights to increase cart size.
one_liner: For large retailers, like Target, that want to sell more to shoppers, especially who are underserved, PairAnything provides digital in-store food & wine pairings and actionable insights to increase cart size.
